reviews.review: Portal is a magnificent puzzle game. The titillating wrongness of every solution and the wonky thinking required to get there make you feel like a space-folding genius, and yet you'll almost never get stuck.

Still a great game. A bit short tho...
Best game for logic tests and puzlles in half life styled engine

Man, this game is AWESOME! It's challenging, full of puzzles, and even features FPS-like gameplay. Overall GREAT graphics, great controls, and that one evil robot that you love to hate, (You all know who I mean. Name starts with a "G"! :D) all make this game worth the money it costs.
One of my favorite games of all time. Orignally played on ps3, then purcahsed on Steam. I played the story mode at least 8 time all the way through, and is still my favorite story in a game.

This game is so fucking awesome! Very nice puzzles and if you play it, you want to do it again!
(I beat it twice)
im only doing this review for the steam awards but game is good

A while ago I thought that Portal 2 was better, because it's just more Portal.

Portal feels like a work of art. Everything in the game has a purpose and fits into the nearly flawless mold that it set out to create. Everything is tonally, mechanically, and thematically consistent throughout the entire game. 

Portal 2 is only a very entertaining shadow of Portal.
